panels.description:
node_disk_io_time_seconds_total：
 disk spends in the input/Output operations on the number of milliseconds.The value is accumulated value.(Milliseconds Spent Doing I/Os）

irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total[1m])：
 calculated per second rate:(The laThe last previous value-The last previous value)/Timestamp difference, namely: disk 1 seconds spent in the I/O operations than of time.
panels.title: CPU utilization, disk I per second/O operation time consuming (%）

panels.description:
Reads completed: Each disk partition read finish times per second

Writes completed: Each disk partition write complete times per second

IO now Each disk partition is processing the input per second/Output the number of requests
panels.title: Disk read/write rate (IOPS)

panels.description:
Read bytes Each disk partition reads the number of bits per second
Written bytes Each disk partition write the number of bits per second
panels.title: Disk read/write capacity size

panels.description:
Read time ms The number of seconds a read operation cost each disk partition

Write time ms Each disk partition write operation cost the number of seconds

IO time ms Each disk partition the input/The number of seconds to output operations spending

IO time weighted Each disk partition the input/Output operation cost of the weighted number of seconds
panels.title: Disk I/o read and write

panels.description:
CurrEstab - The current state of ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT the TCThe number of connections接数

ActiveOpens - from CLOSED State transition to directly SYN-SENT The state of the TCP The average number of connections(One minute)

PassiveOpens - from LISTEN State transition to directly SYN-RCVD The state of the TCP The average number of connections(One minute)

TCP_alloc - Allocated (has been established, has applied to the sk_buff) the number of TCP socket

TCP_inuse - Is using the number of TCP socket (is listening on)

TCP_tw - Waiting for the shut down on the number of TCP connections
panels.title: TCP connectivity
